meanings.definition: The act of sinking to the bottom of a liquid
meanings.sent1: The settling of the sand at the bottom of the ocean created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent2: The settling of the sediment in the glass made the liquid clear.
meanings.sent3: The settling of the tea leaves at the bottom of the cup signaled the end of the drink.
meanings.sent4: The settling of the mud in the pond revealed the hidden treasures beneath.
meanings.sent5: The settling of the particles in the river water formed a distinct layer at the bottom.

meanings.definition: The process of compacting particles in a mixture
meanings.sent1: The settling of the ingredients in the cake batter ensured a smooth texture.
meanings.sent2: The settling of the soil in the garden bed helped the plants grow strong roots.
meanings.sent3: The settling of the sand and cement mixture created a solid foundation for the building.
meanings.sent4: The settling of the paint layers resulted in a vibrant and even color.
meanings.sent5: The settling of the clay particles in the pottery created a sturdy and durable piece.
